0.text: Innate: Leona's abilities mark enemies hit for 1.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Allied  champions' damaging attacks and abilities against a marked target will consume the mark to deal 32 − 168 (based on level) bonus magic damage.
0.html:
Innate: Leona's abilities mark enemies hit for 1.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.

Allied champions' damaging attacks and abilities against a marked target will consume the mark to deal 32 − 168 (based on level) bonus magic damage.
markedPassages: champions'
32 − 168 (based on level)

0.text: Active: Leona illuminates her shield, empowering her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain  50 bonus range, deal bonus magic damage and  stun the target for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Leona illuminates her shield, empowering her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, gain  50 bonus range, deal bonus magic damage and stun the target for 1 second.
markedPassages: 50 bonus range
stun

1.text: Shield of Daybreak  resets Leona's basic attack timer.
1.html: Shield of Daybreak resets Leona's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Shield of Daybreak  resets Leona's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Leona raises her guard for 3 seconds, gaining flat damage reduction of up to 50% of the damage instance and  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.
0.html: Active: Leona raises her guard for 3 seconds, gaining flat damage reduction of up to 50% of the damage instance and  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.
markedPassages: bonus armor
bonus magic resistance

1.text: Her shield detonates after the duration, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. If this hits an enemy, Leona's guard is extended for an additional 3 seconds.
1.html: Her shield detonates after the duration, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. If this hits an enemy, Leona's guard is extended for an additional 3 seconds.

0.text: Active: Leona projects her sword in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Leona projects her sword in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: If she hits at least one enemy  champion, she will  dash 225 units behind the last one struck within 3000 range and  root them for 0.5 seconds.
1.html: If she hits at least one enemy champion, she will dash 225 units behind the last one struck within 3000 range and root them for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
dash
root

2.text: Leona is  unable to move or attack while Zenith Blade is in flight. She can cast any of her abilities during the dash.
2.html: Leona is unable to move or attack while Zenith Blade is in flight. She can cast any of her abilities during the dash.
markedPassages: unable
possibleConcerningAbilities: Leona is  unable to move or attack while Zenith Blade is in flight. She can cast any of her abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Leona calls down a solar flare that strikes upon the target location after 0.625 seconds, granting  sight of the area before impact and for another 3 seconds afterwards. Enemies hit are dealt magic damage.
0.html: Active: Leona calls down a solar flare that strikes upon the target location after 0.625 seconds, granting sight of the area before impact and for another 3 seconds afterwards. Enemies hit are dealt magic damage.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Targets are also  slowed by 80% for 1.75 seconds, or  stunned for the same duration if they are hit by the epicenter.
1.html: Targets are also slowed by 80% for 1.75 seconds, or stunned for the same duration if they are hit by the epicenter.
markedPassages: slowed
stunned
